Title: Celebrate Ricky Sargulesh
Plot: The Party Down team's actors are recognized at a party and treated as stars. But when Roman and Ron discover the host is a mobster, they suspect his screenplay might be a confession.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Steven Weber, Vic Polizos, Maria Zyrianova, Oleg Zatsepin
